mapper.sql: select sd.dept_id, sd.parent_id, sd.ancestors, sd.dept_name, sd.order_num, sd.leader, sd.phone, sd.email, sd.status, sd.del_flag, sd.create_by, sd.create_time, sd.update_by, sd.update_time from sys_dept sd
mapper.select: select * from sys_dept where del_flag = '0' and dept_id = #{deptId}

select sd.dept_id, sd.parent_id, sd.ancestors, sd.dept_name, sd.order_num, sd.leader, sd.phone, sd.email, sd.status, sd.del_flag, sd.create_by, sd.create_time, sd.update_by, sd.update_time, (select s.dept_name from sys_dept s where s.dept_id = sd.parent_id and sd.parent_id != 0) as parent_name, (select su.user_name from sys_user su where su.user_id = sd.leader and sd.leader is not null ) as leader_name from sys_dept sd where sd.dept_id = #{deptId}
